content.description: a 25 foot tall chunk of rock that is split off from the main wall of trippy rock. there are two climbable sides to this boulder. although the downhill side features an interesting slab route, the landing features a 4 foot cliff drop, so wouldn't suggest it, resist the beautiful holds on the downhill side for safety reasons. The arete feature has a good route through it, and a good landing. And finally the shady uphill side is noticeably vertical. At least two different routes can be done on this side.
